title: Personnel Evaluations related to Building & Code Administration officials (Volusia County, Florida Human Resources)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a Freedom of Information Act and Privacy Act request pursuant to Florida Sunshine Law.  

I hereby request the below information for the following Volusia County Building & Code Administration personnel: Kerry Leuzinger, Paul Traider, and Jeff Bergman.

1) Performance evaluations and/or employee reviews for the past 36 months
2) Employer memos, notes and reports from employee's performance evaluations for the past 36 months
3) Write-ups of any internal or external employee disputes filed in the past 36 months.
4) Any complaints or disputes filed or reported via phone, email, letter or other means of communication regarding the employee's conduct during the past 36 months.
5) Videotape or phone video recordings of official activity while in public view during the course of work during the past 36 months.
6) Drug screenings and results, including requests for drug screenings not voluntarily undertaken, for the past during the past 36 months.
7) Mental health evaluations conducted within the past 36 months.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge, processed by a representative of the news media/press, and is not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request.

I would prefer the request be filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available.

Should my request be refused, kindly provide the specific legislative citation for the rejection, as required by Section 119.07(1)(d) of the Florida Statutes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within a reasonable time frame, according to Section 119.07(1)(a),(c) of the Florida Statutes.

Sincerely,

Lourdes Gonzalez

title: Stop Work Order notices issued in Volusia County (2020-present) (Volusia County Building & Code Administration)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a request for a public record made pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law Freedom of Information Act. 

I hereby request the following information: 

Any and all records pertaining to Stop Work Orders issued against residential properties in Volusia County by code enforcement officials Paul Traider, or Jeff Bergman, or Kerry Leuzinger, between January 1, 2020 to present.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge, processed by a representative of the news media/press, and is not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. 

I would prefer the request be filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available.

Should my request be refused, kindly provide the specific legislative citation for the rejection, as required by Section 119.07(1)(d) of the Florida Statutes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within a reasonable time frame, according to Section 119.07(1)(a),(c) of the Florida Statutes.

Sincerely,

Lourdes Gonzalez
